#summary Collection of usefull maven commands

= Introduction =

Usefull maven commands should be collected here, so we do not have to search them again and again.

= Building = 
== Avoid running tests ==
Sometimes you do not want to run the test while building a project (even if this is not a good idea!). You can avoid this by using this VM argument: -Dmaven.test.skip=true

*Example*

`mvn -Dmaven.test.skip=true build`

= Deployment =
== Deploy a non-maven project ==
If you have a non-maven project (a jar file) and you want to add this to a maven project, you should deploy that file either to your local repository or to the shared repository and add a maven dependey to your project. Maven has two plugins for that.

=== Install locally ===

Install-Plugin -> [http://maven.apache.org/plugins/maven-install-plugin/usage.html]

*Example*

`mvn install:install-file -Dfile=whiteboard.jar -DgroupId=colab.vt -DartifactId=whiteboard -Dversion=1.0 -Dpackaging=jar -DgeneratePom=true -DcreateChecksum=true`

=== Deploy remotely ===

Install-Remote -> [http://maven.apache.org/plugins/maven-deploy-plugin/usage.html]

*Example*

`mvn deploy:deploy-file -Durl=http://mvn.collide.info/content/repositories/releases/ -DrepositoryId=mvn_collide_releases -Dfile=whiteboard.jar -DgroupId=colab.vt -DartifactId=whiteboard -Dversion=1.0 -Dpackaging=jar -DgeneratePom=true -DcreateChecksum=true`
